Direct Known Subclasses:
AeCompensationHandler, AeDefaultFaultHandler, AeTerminationHandler
public abstract class AeFCTHandler
extends AeActivityParent
implements IAeFCTHandler

Base class for Fault, Compensation, and Termination handlers.

Returns:

getCoordinatedActivityCompensator

public AeActivityCompensateImpl getCoordinatedActivityCompensator()
Returns a compensator with coordinated CompInfo objects. This method creates one if the current member variable is null.

Returns:
Returns a compensator with coordinated CompInfo objects.

isEnableCoordinatedActivityCompensation

protected abstract boolean isEnableCoordinatedActivityCompensation()
Returns:
Returns true if the coordinated activities (invokes) should also be compensated after executing the normal list of CompInfo objects.
